alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Beauregard; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 05 at 2:09PM CST until February 06 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Vernon, Rapides, Avoyelles, Beauregard, Allen, Evangeline and St. Landry Parishes. In Texas, Tyler, Northern Jasper and Northern Newton Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 8 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will be below freezing for 8 to 12 hours and at or below hard freeze conditions for 1 to 4 hours in some locations.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Avoyelles; Beauregard; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry; Vernon
